alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 3:33AM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 2 feet, locally higher amounts above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountain and Sheep Range. * WHEN...Snow will become heavy late this morning through this evening, then taper off through 4 am PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on roads up to Kyle and Lee Canyons, as well as Highway 160 at Mountain Springs Summit. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Watch for downed trees and powerlines as well.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
